mapper.sql: resNum, resDate, resTime, borName, resRegdate, borNum, resCount, memId
mapper.select:
SELECT FROM( SELECT ROWNUM num, FROM ( SELECT FROM reserve
ORDER BY resRegdate DESC ) ) WHERE num between #{startRow} and #{endRow}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO reserve VALUES ( resNum.nextval, #{resDate}, #{resTime}, #{borName}, sysdate, #{borNum}, #{resCount}, #{memId} )
mapper.update: UPDATE reserve SET resDate = #{resDate}, resTime = #{resTime}, borName = #{borName}, resCount = #{resCount} WHERE resNum = #{resNum}
